DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare efficacy calcium gluconate infusion versus cabergoline prevention ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) patient pretreated GnRH agonist long protocol high risk OHSS .
DOC.brief_title: Cabergoline Versus Calcium Gluconate Infusion Prevention Ovarian Hyperstimulation Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) serious complication assist reproduction . Previous study reveal calcium gluconate infusion reduce risk OHSS . Other study reveal cabergoline ( potent dopamine receptor agonist D2 receptor ) effective prevent OHSS . The aim study compare efficacy calcium gluconate infusion versus cabergoline prevention ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) patient pretreated GnRH agonist long protocol high risk OHSS .
DOC.criteria: Patients stimulate use long luteal GnRH agonist protocol high risk develop OHSS [ 18 follicle ( > 11mm ) serum estradiol â‰¥ 3000 pg/ml day HCG administration ] . Fibrosis lung Swelling inflammation around heart lung Hypertension Liver disease Heart valve disease allergy cabergoline ergot derivative .
